text: ya 'ayuha aladhin amanuu la tatakhidhuu alyahud walnsara hlfa' wansarana ela ahl al'iyman; dhlk 'anahum la yuaddun almwmnyn, falyhwd ywaly bedhm bedana, wkdhlk alnsara, wakulana alfariqayn yajtamie ealaa edawtkm. wa'antum -ayha almwmnwn- ajdr bi'ana yansur bedukm bedana. waman yatawalahum minkum fa'iinah yasir min jmlthm, whkmh hkmhm. 'iina allah la yuafiq alzaalimin aldhyn yatawalawn alkafryn
